dialogues: Ebenezer: Grace, you are the one behind this murder.
Grace: I- I don’t know what you’re t-talking about!
Grace: As f-far as I know, I-I never saw a b-body anywhere!
Ebenezer: Unfortunately it’s true. I found her earlier today in a dumpster next to the building.
Grace: That’s i-insane! And you think I-I was the one who did it??
Ebenezer: I have evidence that supports the fact that you were the one who brought our victim to her demise.
playerResponses: I… actually don’t have any proof.
